mainText:
I bought my first iMac two years ago and it opened up a universe of  
new possibilities in the projects I want to accomplish.  I admire the  
beauty and elegance of Apple products and how they merge with function  
as ONE.

Steve's ideas changed the world, changed what we thought was  
possible.   I feel a sense of loss in "the world" now that you are not  
on earth any longer.  Thank you for everything.  We will miss you,  
greatly.
author: Carla
